description.paragraph1: After several years as a chef in Germany and Spain, I transitioned into *tech*. The kitchen gave me *discipline*, *attention to detail*, *teamwork*, and the ability to perform *under pressure*.
description.paragraph2: I hold studies in *Business Administration & Finance* and *Multiplatform Application Development*. This mix lets me combine *analytical thinking*, *business perspective*, and a strong foundation in *programming* and *data*.
description.paragraph3: I'm actively looking for an opportunity to *add value from day one*, keep learning, and grow in a demanding environment. I'm driven by *challenges*, *continuous improvement*, and building products with *real impact*.
